name: Riverlands
description:
The tides are turning! It seems like rivers have been sprouting everywhere! Build your town and your economy to try and survive as long as possible. How to play :
  1. Build a city center to start;
  2. Build houses to increase your population;
  3. Protect your population and buildings with dams;
  4. Connect buildings through water with bridge;
  5. Protect your city center no matter what!
Controls :

You only need your mouse to play 🖱️

  • Left click : To select a building and build it.
  • Right click : Cancel your building selection mode.
  • Mouse wheel : Zoom in & out for a better view.
  • Drag with left click : Move around.
